forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the air is crisp with a soothing warmth, blessed by the sun's presence. As the high nudges near 65, you may feel a gentle breeze—10 to 17 miles per hour, with playful gusts to add some character to your stroll. The clarity of the day invites you to pause and appreciate the arresting views of the Bay, without the usual blanket of fog that can envelop the area. The marine layer, usually a fixture in these climes, appears to have retreated, leaving the Golden Gate Bridge gracefully standing against a vivid blue backdrop. 

As night approaches, anticipate a subtle shift in mood; the temperature will soften to a comfortable 52 degrees under a canvas of partly cloudy skies. The west wind will continue its lively dance, perhaps nudging you toward a light jacket or sweater. A leisurely evening walk along the waterfront or a quiet dinner outdoors seems especially delightful under such auspicious conditions. As you contemplate how to engage with this charming day, a visit to one of the city's many parks for a moment of reflection or a simple coffee in the sun might just be the perfect antidote to the week’s hustle.
